section.para:
sites creating new exceptions for
calendars creating new exceptions for To define an exception to the standard work week for a Site, select the "NEW" button. The following screen will appear:
When defining an exception to the standard work week for a Site, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Select to create the calendar exception for all Sites.
Settings made using this option will be inherited by all Sites.
Select the Site whose work week you want to define.
Specify which days the Site is open for business. Settings made using this option are specific to the selected Site.
Enter text to describe the calendar exception.
Specify the date when the calendar exception begins.
Specify the date when the calendar exception ends.

tip.para: If the calendar exception is one day long, use the same date in the start date and end date fields.

listitem.para: Specify which type of calendar exception you are defining:
If selected, you are indicating the specified Site(s) is open during the defined time period.
If selected, you are indicating the specified Site(s) is closed during the defined time period.
